mapper.insert: insert into member(email, password, user_name, gender, user_tel, join_date) values(#{email, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{user_name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gender, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{user_tel, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select email, password from member where email=#{email} and password=#{password}
